item.description:
I am really excited about this month's meeting. It is a WINGS program. We have an all-star cast of speakers coming to discuss "Pilot Operations and The Fort Devens Restricted Areas R-4102A and R-4102B." The topics are so big we need four speakers to cover them!

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WINGS Program Info:

Come join Keith Jackson, Fort Devens Range Control Officer and Coleman Hartigan, Boston TRACON Support Manager for a detailed analysis of Restricted Areas R-4102A and R-4102B. The presentation will probe the essentials for avoiding flight operations in Restricted Areas during active hours of operations and offer a comprehensive look at the improved NOTAM distribution process.  Attendee participation at this event is highly encouraged. 
  
As an added benefit, FAASTeam Representative. Bob Adelizzi and FAASTeam Program Manager Jim Adams will address pilot /controller communication responsibilities and Temporary Flight Restrictions (TFR) avoidance. 

Please sign up online on the FAA website at https://www.faasafety.gov/SPANS/event_publicregistration.aspx?eid=43167.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please sign up both on Meetup and the FAA website so we can get an accurate idea of how many are going to attend.

When you see Jim Bisson, Charley Valera, and Bob Adelizzi, give them a big thank you for putting this together!

Food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site
